features.additionalInfo: Enjoy secure Online Business Banking at your fingertips. As a customer on this account you may also be entitled to apply for our Online Business Banking service. If you apply for that service you will be provided with a separate Product Disclosure Statement and your use of the service will be a matter of separate agreement with us. Separate fees are applicable for this service.
Make extra repayments without penalty. Pay more than your minimum repayments at any time to help reduce your loan term.
Ability to capitalise interest monthly (subject to approval and conditions).
Pay monthly, quarterly, half yearly, annually.
Ability to change your scheduled interest payment and scheduled repayment dates (please note that we may not allow more than one change to the due date within the same interest raising period).
Principal and interest or choose to pay interest only for one to five years before starting principal and interest repayments.
On-line redraw facility for quick access to surplus funds (costs apply).

constraints.additionalInfo: Loans must be a minimum of $10,000 (no maximum).

eligibility.additionalInfo: Loan funds are for the purpose of capital acquisition or investment in your business.

eligibility.additionalValue: Relationship managed customers only (limited exceptions may apply).
eligibility.additionalInfo: Only available to relationship managed customers (limited exceptions may apply).
Residential or Commercial property and other assets can be used as security and must meet Bankwest lending criteria.

fees.name: Bank Cheque Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Multiple fees instances may apply, however this may be shown as a total amount in your contract.

fees.name: Loan Maintenance Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A $240 annual Loan Maintenance Fee applies to this account and is raised based on the interest raising period selected, either monthly, quarterly, half yearly or annually and is payable in arrears.

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Notified on application

fees.name: Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee is payable if you apply to vary any of the terms of this Agreement.

fees.name: Refinance Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Refinance Fee is calculated on the portion of the Facility that is refinanced with another lender and is subject to our discretion.

fees.name: Covenant Breach Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee is payable on breach of any covenant contained in the Offer Letter.

fees.name: Renegotiation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee is payable if you apply to amend any of the terms of this Agreement.

fees.name: Manual Redraw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where the Bank processes the redraw for you, a fee will be charged for each withdrawal. To arrange for a redraw of available funds, contact your Business Manager.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Special rate for fully secured, new facilities up to $1m. Rates are intended for new borrowings only and subject to change. A margin may apply to the above rates based on our full credit assessment of your loan application.
Variable base rates are intended for new borrowings only and subject to change. A margin may apply to the above rates based on our full credit assessment of your loan application.

The overdue rate automatically applies to an account where either: a) The facility has expired - applies to the entire balance or b) Where the facility is overdrawn - applies to overdrawn portion where balance exceeds the limit.

data.name: Business Low Rate Loan
data.description: The Business Low Rate Loan is a lending facility offering a competitive variable interest rate, flexible terms and a range of security options such as residential, commercial and/or rural properties. Loan funds are for the purpose of capital acquisition or investment in your business.
